column2: “Respondent”) was a former employee attached to the Respondent – Appellant -
Appellant (hereinafter referred to as the “Appellant bank” or as the “Appellant”).
He joined the Appellant bank in September 1992 as a Technical Officer attached to
its  ‘Premises  and  Engineering  Division’.  In  2006,  he  had  been  promoted  to  the
position of Manager (Services). For all purposes, he worked as an Engineer of the
Appellant  bank.  To  the  extent  relevant  to  this  Appeal,  the  Respondent  was
procurement, installation, removal, replacement, and the maintenance of the air
conditioning systems of the Appellant Bank.
